alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:08PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lee and northern Phillips Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 208 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmer, or 10 miles west of Marvell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Helena-West Helena, Lexa, Rondo, Aubrey, Watkins Corner, Lagrange, Wycamp, Latour, Turkey Scratch, Vineyard, Cypress Corner, Poplar Grove, Big Creek Corner, Oneida, Barton, Kindall, Phillips Bayou, Kingtown and Gobell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
